pyqgis_plugin.name: MTL Tools
pyqgis_plugin.description: Ferramentas para exportação em lote e substituição massiva de textos em layouts.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Automatiza exportações, substituições e processos repetitivos envolvendo layouts.
pyqgis_plugin.author: Matheus Martinelli
pyqgis_plugin.changelog: 1.2.6 - UI reorganization, About menu, tool instructions, icon fixes, UTM zone and elevation by map click. 1.2.5 - QGIS 3.16 compatibility updates, PDF/PNG export fixes, Python dependencies installer. 1.2.4 - DEM Validator (initial and unstable implementation). 1.2.3 - Major processing refactor, statistics fixes, output CRS support, QGIS restart fix. 1.2.2 - General bug fixes and internal improvements. 1.2.1 - Bug fixes, statistics text field correction. 1.2.0 - New tools and processing algorithms, batch raster sampling, UI and replace improvements. 1.1.2 - Plugin UI tab, export stability fixes, PDF/PNG book generation, preferences support. 1.1.1 - Restart QGIS tool and Processing Provider. 1.1.0 - Replace Text in Layouts with automatic backup and detailed logging. 1.0.0 - Export All Layouts (PDF/PNG).
